moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Autotomize
moves.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.
